body_content.explanation: a game in which people dress up and pretend to be particular characters:
examples: I love playing murder mystery role-playing games.
The kids took part in a role-playing game to simulate a trial for a bank robbery.

body_content.explanation: a game played by players sitting around a table, often using a board, dice, and small models, in which players take the parts of particular characters:
examples: The game can be considered to be the digital age version of the 1970s role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons, in which players pretend to be wizards and warriors fighting make-believe monsters.
He started out developing the tabletop role-playing game "Toon" before getting into video games.

body_content.explanation: a computer game in which players control the actions of characters in an imaginary world:
examples: He plays online role-playing games an average of 80 hours a week.
The game is a cartoonish role-playing game in which the player controls the gunmen in a top-down view.
The company specializes in multi-player online roleplaying games.
